summary: Scientists create a genetically engineered sabretooth cat and must hunt it down after it escapes and begins eating innocent people.
cast: David Keith|Vanessa Angel|John Rhys-Davies|Jenna Gering|Josh Holloway|Lahmard J. Tate|Nicole Tubiola|Phillip Glasser|Steffanie Busey|Allie Moss|Todd Jensen|Kelly Nelson|Scott Vandiver|Justin Carroll|James D.R. Hickox
keywords: saber toothed tiger|psychotronic film|tiger|karate|science runs amok
title: Dientes de Sable
